meanings.definition: The act of making a loud, deep sound like an owl.
meanings.sent1: The hooting of the owl echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: I woke up to the hooting of an owl outside my window.
meanings.sent3: The hooting of the owl startled the squirrel, making it drop its acorn.
meanings.sent4: The hooting of the owl cut through the silence of the night like a sharp knife.
meanings.sent5: The hooting of the owl was so haunting, it stayed with me all day.

meanings.definition: A loud, deep sound like an owl.
meanings.sent1: The eerie hooting in the distance made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The hooting of the owl was a familiar sound in the woods.
meanings.sent3: The hooting of the owl seemed to be in a conversation with the wind.
meanings.sent4: The hooting of the owl filled the night with a mysterious melody.
meanings.sent5: The hooting of the owl was a symphony of nature's nighttime sounds.
